content:
It's understandable to have a sentimental attachment to the traditional way of watching TV shows, and it's important to note that even with the rise of streaming and social media, traditional TV isn't likely to disappear completely. There will always be viewers who prefer to watch shows on a TV set, or who enjoy tuning in to live events in real-time.

Plus, many networks are adapting to the changing landscape and finding ways to coexist with streaming and social media. For example, some networks are offering streaming options for their shows, while others are incorporating social media integrations into their live broadcasts to encourage more viewer engagement.

Ultimately, it's likely that we'll see a variety of options for consuming media in the future, ranging from traditional TV to streaming to emerging technologies like virtual reality. As with any industry, the entertainment industry is constantly evolving, and it will be fascinating to see how it continues to transform in the years to come.
